fields.name: suffix_text

collection.name: form_field_select
collection.html: <select id="{{id}}" name="{{name}}" ng-controller="_select{{id}}"><option ng-repeat="option in options" ng-selected="[[option.value == value]]" value="[[option.value]]">[[option.label]]</option> </select>
